1.title: mothers medicine
1.desc:
I. Objective: Administer medications safely and accurately.
II. Verify: Confirm medication, dose, and timing against prescription.
III. Prepare: Assemble required medication and supplies.
IV. Administer: Assist patient with timely medication intake.

2.title: workout
2.desc:
I. Objective: Execute a comprehensive full body workout to improve overall fitness.

II. Key Steps:
    a. Perform compound exercises targeting major muscle groups.
    b. Incorporate isolation exercises to address specific muscle weaknesses.
    c. Conclude with stretching and cool-down activities.

3.title: mother's meds
3.desc: Refill and administer mother's medications. Check dosages and ensure timely administration.
